title: RO Water Purifier Installation
description: Expert installation of Reverse Osmosis (RO) water purifiers with plumbing support.
process: Inspection of installation area and water source
Mounting and connecting the RO unit to plumbing

title: RO Purifier General Service
description: Routine maintenance including cleaning, pressure check, and functionality test.
process: Initial system inspection and pre-service check
Cleaning of filters and outer body

title: Filter Cartridge Replacement
description: Replacement of pre-filter, sediment, and carbon cartridges for all purifier models.
process: Remove and replace with new cartridges
Flush the system for proper flow

title: UV Water Purifier Repair
description: Repair services for UV purifiers, including bulb replacement and leak fixes.
process: Inspect the UV bulb and electrical board

title: Annual Maintenance Contract (AMC)
description: Yearly service contract with 3 free visits and priority support.

title: Water Purifier Uninstallation
description: Safe and careful removal of water purifiers for relocation or replacement.
process: Careful detachment of unit from wall or base

title: Water Quality Test
description: Testing of water TDS and quality levels to ensure purifier performance.

title: RO Membrane Replacement
description: High-quality membrane replacement to restore purification efficiency.

title: Leakage Repair Service
description: Fix pipe and filter leaks in all types of water purifiers.

title: Water Purifier Relocation
description: Full-service purifier shifting with disassembly, transport, and reinstallation.
